thread.title: Saif and Kareena may lose their brand to Ranbir
thread.title_full: Saif and Kareena may lose their brand to Ranbir | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Saif and Kareena may lose their brand to Ranbir
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Natasha Coutinho | October 08, 2015, 23.40 pm Ranbir Kapoor A li’l birdie tells us that a popular shampoo brand that has Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor representing them has now approached Bebo’s cousin Ranbir to be the face of the brand. A source in the know says, “Saif and Kareena have been associated with the brand for many years now.
The brand authorities were looking for a new face and have zeroed in on Ranbir. With the Tamasha promotions beginning soon, a lot of buzz is expected around him. On the other hand there hasn’t been much buzz around Saif and Kareena for a while now. The brand is hoping to crack the deal with Ranbir.”
We texted Ranbir, Saif and Kareena to confirm the development but they chose not to reply.
 Saif Ali Khan Kareena Kapoor entertainment Bollywood Also Read Not without family: Arbaaz Khan Salman supports Katrina's sister Isabel at ‘Dr Cabbie’ music launch Rani Mukerji's first outing after secret wedding! Our bride dazzles in red Better luck next time!
